dc:creator.description: The individual, agent, or organisation that authored the Policy.

dc:description.description: A human-readable representation or summary of the Policy.

dc:issued.description: The date (and time) the Policy was first issued.

dc:modified.description: The date (and time) the Policy was updated.

dc:coverage.description: The jurisdiction under which the Policy is relevant.

dc:replaces.description: The identifier of a Policy that this Policy supersedes.

dc:isReplacedBy.description: The identifier of a Policy that supersedes this Policy.

description: Interface for ODRL Policy Metadata using Dublin Core terms. While these aren't explicitly defined in the ODRL spec, they are valid and useful metadata properties that follow Dublin Core standards.
